com.googlecode.prmf.merapi.nio
Interface Registrar

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRegistrar, SelectingThread, SocketClientsThread
public interface Registrar

Mediator between SelectableChannels and Selectors.

Author:
Miorel-Lucian Palii

Method Summary
 void deregister(SelectableChannel channel)
          Cancels the channel's registration with this registrar's backing selector.
 SelectionKey register(SelectableChannel channel, int ops)
          Registers a channel with this registrar's backing selector, returning a selection key with the specified interest set and a null attachment.
 SelectionKey register(SelectableChannel channel, int ops, Object attachment)
          Registers a channel with this registrar's backing selector, returning a selection key with the specified interest set and attachment.
 

Method Detail

register

SelectionKey register(SelectableChannel channel,
                      int ops)
                      throws ClosedChannelException
Registers a channel with this registrar's backing selector, returning a selection key with the specified interest set and a null attachment. This method is equivalent to calling register(channel, ops, null).

Parameters:
channel - the channel to register
ops - the desired interest set for the resulting key
Returns:
a key representing the registration
Throws:
ClosedChannelException - if the channel is closed

register

SelectionKey register(SelectableChannel channel,
                      int ops,
                      Object attachment)
                      throws ClosedChannelException
Registers a channel with this registrar's backing selector, returning a selection key with the specified interest set and attachment.

Parameters:
channel - the channel to register
ops - the desired interest set for the resulting key
attachment - the attachment for the resulting key, may be null
Returns:
a key representing the registration
Throws:
ClosedChannelException - if the channel is closed

deregister

void deregister(SelectableChannel channel)
Cancels the channel's registration with this registrar's backing selector.

Parameters:
channel - the channel to deregister
